name: dockpeek
description: Dockpeek is a simple command-line utility to inspect Docker container states and metadata without full Docker access. It helps users view container status, layers, and configurations quickly and securely.
features: Container Inspection: View container states and metadata quickly. Fast insights.
Limited Access: Inspect without full Docker permissions. Secure viewing.
Layer Analysis: Examine container layers and configurations. Deep visibility.
Quick Status: Check container health rapidly. Instant information.
Secure Tool: Minimal permissions required for inspection. Safe operations.
CLI Utility: Simple command-line interface. Efficient workflow.
